## Description {#details}

Helper class for helping synchronize access to the global address map table.

Access to this class should be serialized under a mutex.

Definition at line 64 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/executionengine-h">ExecutionEngine.h</a>.

### GlobalAddressReverseMap {#a2a907789af2882dac5f6bab48c69c892}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::map&lt;uint64&#95;t, std::string&gt; llvm::ExecutionEngineState::GlobalAddressReverseMap</>}>
GlobalAddressReverseMap - This is the reverse mapping of GlobalAddressMap, used to convert raw addresses into the LLVM global value that is emitted at the address.

This map is not computed unless getGlobalValueAtAddress is called at some point.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/executionengine-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/executionengine-h">ExecutionEngine.h</a>.
